Package com.github.shiftac.upartier.data

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.shiftac.upartier.data.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PacketGenerator, ByteArrayIO

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements ByteArrayIO, PacketGenerator
    Information about a single user. when transferring as bytes using ByteArrayIO: 
     class User
 {
     int id;
     int age;
     int postCount;
     byte gender;
     BString mailAccount;
     BString nickname;
     Image profile;
 }

      • login

        public static User login​(LoginInf inf)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                         NoSuchUserException
        Attempts to login(or register) use the given LoginInf, try to fetch User for the user if login succeeded.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists or wrong password is given.

      • logout

        public void logout​()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                   NoSuchUserException
        Attempts to log out the current user.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists or wrong password is given.

      • fetchProfile

        public static User fetchProfile​(int id)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                                NoSuchUserException
        Attempts to fetch user profile for a given user ID.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.

      • modify

        public void modify​()
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                   NoSuchUserException,
                   PermissionException
        Attempts to modify user profile.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't get reply from server after Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.
        PermissionException - if this is not current user.

      • fetchMyPosts

        public void fetchMyPosts​(int count)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                         NoSuchUserException
        Try to fetch last count posts with id less than id issued by current user, or fetch all remaining posts if there're not so many. The Post objects returned by this call will in prefetched state.

        Current thread will block inside this call.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.

      • issue

        public void issue​(Post post)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  NoSuchUserException,
                  NoSuchBlockException,
                  java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        Try to issue a new post. The id, time, postUser field of the parameter Post will be properly set on successful returns.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.
        NoSuchBlockException - if no such block exists.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(Post post,
                        MessageInf message)
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        NoSuchUserException,
                        NoSuchPostException,
                        java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                        PermissionException
        Try to send a reply message under a given post. This also modify messages field of the parameter Post. On successful returns time field of parameter message will be properly set.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.
        NoSuchPostException - if no such post exists.
        PermissionException - if current user can't send message on this post.

      • join

        public void join​(Post post)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 NoSuchUserException,
                 NoSuchPostException,
                 java.net.SocketTimeoutException
        Attempt to join a post, throw an error if after this operation current user doesn't belong to the post.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if network exceptions occured.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - if can't hear from server for Client.NETWORK_TIMEOUT milliseconds.
        NoSuchUserException - if no such user exists.
        NoSuchPostException - if no such post exists.

      • getLength

        public int getLength​()
        Description copied from interface: ByteArrayIO
        Note: this method should only be called after the object is properly initialized, but once initialized, this method should return the number of bytes it will consume when write() is called(or number of bytes it comsumed when read() was called previously).
        Specified by:
        getLength in interface ByteArrayIO
